metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9085 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Hoteldruid before v2.3.1 allows remote authenticated users to cause adenial of service (invoice-creation outage) via the n_file parameter tovisualizza_contratto.php with invalid arguments (any non-numeric value), asdemonstrated by the anno=2019&id_transazione=1&numero_contratto=1&n_file=aquery string to visualizza_contratto.php.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
